Invocation Name: hoa simulator
des: You've risen the ranks to become HOA president, can you lead it to prosperity? With starting funds of $10,000, see if you can make the right decisions and lead your HOA to success, keeping the residents safe and happy! Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
